GSD.description:
tracing: Fix sleeping function called from invalid context on RT kernel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit be1f323fb9d9b14a505ca22d742d321769454de1. For more details please see the references link.
